channel.title: Help plz?
channel.description: i want to know how i can put a signature at the bottom of my name..plz help?

item.description:

lol ty so much…1 more question…it says 20 percent done how can i put 20% of the bar done?

item.title: Help plz?
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Look @ the top of the screen, under where it says your name you should see “profile” click on that.

Once your in your profile, look to the left side of the screen. There you should see two menus, look @ the bottom menu titled “Modify Profile” & click “Account Related Settings” Scroll down and the very last menu you are able to set up a signature.

Avatars are for administrators only, same goes for signature images. Text is only allowed.

Read full topic
